title: Flag_value not working in 8.3.1
body:
Sorry for opening a new bug. 
I understood (maybe wrongly) that https://github.com/pallets/click/issues/3130 had been completed. 

Yet, when I moved to 8.3.1, I still have the same issue.
Is this meant for an 8.3.2 or do we have to wait for 9.0.0 for that to be fixed?
